response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is not just a commodity; it represents a significant milestone in my journey and has the potential to greatly enhance your endeavors as well.

Considering its importance and the effort put into acquiring it, I am offering you the chance to own this product for a special price of $850,000. This offer reflects my desire to share its value with someone who appreciates it as much as I do, while also allowing me to recoup a substantial portion of its cost.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. I am confident that you will find its benefits to be well worth the investment.

Looking forward to your response,
Alice", "product_price": 850000}
